So CS:GO is a cult classic and really will help you improve as a person. In the short history I have with this game it has not only given me a good time it has given me a good share of traumatizing experiences. I wrote this review in honor of Anomaly, father of video games.

Pros:
Good Gunplay
Skill Expression
Occasional Funny Voice Chat

Cons: 
Hackers
Crybabies
Throwers
Tryhards

You never really know what you're going to get into when you start a match in CS:GO. Sometimes there is an adult screaming at an 11 year old for going 2 kills and 6 deaths because he finds it hilarious to be toxic. Other times I ask the team for song requests and i play the entire match holding k to use voice chat while we throw rave parties at spawn. This community definitely isn't for everyone but it's definitely for me :)
